rules_text:
Whenever Winestago Freighter enters or attacks, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
